pains: Client info lives in 5 places. None of them agree.
Your team spends half the day on email instead of real work.
You bought 6 tools. They don't talk to each other.
You want to scale but can't even document how things work today.
problemSection.closing: This isn't a tech problem. It's a structure problem.

servicesSection.title: Connect. Automate. Augment.
servicesSection.subtitle: From scattered operations to a connected, intelligent business.

connect.title: CONNECT — Get Your House in Order
connect.description: One CRM. One source of truth. Apps that actually talk to each other. We clean up your data, connect your tools, and give your team a system that reflects reality — not five conflicting spreadsheets.

automate.title: AUTOMATE — Stop Doing the Robot's Job
automate.description: If a human shouldn't be doing it, a human shouldn't be doing it. We build automations that handle email triage, follow-ups, task routing, and data entry — so your team focuses on work that actually needs a brain.

augment.title: AUGMENT — Add Intelligence to the Mix
augment.description: With your systems connected and your processes automated, we layer in AI that handles real work. Calls answered 24/7. Client questions handled instantly. Your team's knowledge, searchable in seconds.
outcomes: Chat agent trained on your business
